title: Facing Oppn criticism on Budget, Sitharaman mocks Rahul Gandhi over ‘poverty a state of mind’ remark - The Indian Express
content:
1. Facing Oppn criticism on Budget, Sitharaman mocks Rahul Gandhi over ‘poverty a state of mind’ remark  The Indian Express
  2. "Said Poverty Is 'State Of Mind': Nirmala Sitharaman's Dig At Rahul Gandhi  NDTV
  3. 'Poverty a state of mind?': Cong fumes in anger after Nirmala mocks Rahul Gandhi over Budget 2022  Hindustan Times
  4. You started privatisation in 1991: Sitharaman to Cong in Rajya Sabha  Business Standard
  5. You started privatisation in 1991: Sitharaman to Congress in Rajya Sabha  Deccan Herald
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Speaking in the Rajya Sabha, Sitharaman, without naming Gandhi, referred to the Congress leader's remarks on poverty to counter the criticism from Opposition leaders, including former finance minister P Chidambaram, that the Budget left out the poor.
